description:
Winds of Change

Submitted to VR-JAM 2021 hosted by Speaknspell (Jeff A), Valem, phantomunboxing, C-Through 

This game was developed in 1.62 days for VR Jam 2021.

Theme "Small World"

Game

You're a God or Goddess looking down at your followers and you need more in your house of worship to grow your power over your small world! Motivate them with the sound of your voice and push them in the direction you want them to go.

  • Rotate map with joysticks
  • Speak or blow into your microphone to push your followers

Theme Inspiration

Populous, Spore, Godus, Black & White, Lemmings, Age of Empires, Marble Madness

Gameplay

Blow as many followers into your house of worship to score points.

Villager = 1 point

Drunk = 2 points

Augments = get villager to walk over item for speed boost, invincibility, etc (time limited)

Holy Relics = overall time increase (either walk over it, or pick up and get to house of worship to extend time) 

HAZARDS

  • Blowing too hard could make them get smashed into wall
  • Carts blocking paths
  • Water (drown/die)
  • Pits (die)
  • Drunken villagers (not as easy to control)
  • Skeletons wandering around (invicible - air blows through skeleton)

 

Unity Functionality

  • Microphone for measuring white noise volume for breath/sound: https://markduisters.com/project/miccontrol/
  • Wind physics
  • AI for followers
  • Time & scoring

 

Environment

  • Procedural maps
  • Medieval town
  • Villages in country

 

Assets

  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/celtic-garamond-2nd.font?text=Breathe+of+God
  • Synty Packs - characters, objects, buildings, trees and terrain
  • Adventure Pack, Knights Pack (has house of worship), Vikings Pack, Pirates Pack (and many more)
  • MicControl3 - use microphone for volume to control: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/audio/miccontrol-3-48547
  • Sensor Toolkit - AI detection: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/ai/sensor-toolkit-88036

Enjoy!
